JobFullDesc: Office 365 is one of the fastest growing business at Microsoft and in the industry.  Today, tens of millions of organizations and hundreds of millions of users world-wide depend on Office 365 for their day-to-day productivity.  Even at this scale, our business is growing with double digit percentage year by year.  Office 365 Core is the team that's behind all this success, by building the massively scalable distributed systems and infrastructure that power the major Office 365 workloads such as Exchange Online, Teams, and many other services across Office 365 and Microsoft. We have a broad set of technology areas and challenges, including storage, high availability, identity, service fabric, engineering infra, data intelligence / artificial intelligence, security, enterprise hybrid, multi-media / real-time communication, information protection, etc.  We have a dynamic team culture that encourages learning, collaboration, and making bold bets.  We are looking for passionate engineers to join us, to learn, and deliver amazing impact to our business and community with innovation and technology. #OXO ResponsibilitiesIn this position, you will build the tools, technologies, and services that enable the engineering pipeline for Office 365.
